archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0920
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a finance user, I am able to see details on interest free products and balances with details on outstanding terms.

properties.value: Please clarify, who is "finance user", what type of operations should be available to him? DX response: Financial Accountant, ability to run reports and view customer accounts and transactions. Should not have the ability to apply credit/generate bills etc Any accounting info at customer level.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
